meta.title: Davinia Do Santo | Tattoo Artist
meta.description: Editorial portfolio by Davinia Do Santo. Black and grey realism, anime and color pop art with a cinematic, minimal aesthetic.

hero.subtitle: Black & Grey Realism · Anime · Color Pop Art
hero.description: My work focuses on black and grey realism, anime style and color pop art. Every piece is built with intention and precision.

styles.label: MY STYLE
styles.headline: A selection of the styles I work with.

realism_bn.title: B&G REALISM
realism_bn.description: I work black and grey realism with contrast, texture and depth.

anime.title: ANIME
anime.description: I interpret characters and scenes with clear storytelling and clean lines.

color_pop_art.title: COLOR POP ART
color_pop_art.description: Color, energy and a pop read with a composition made for your body.

trajectory.label: MY PATH
trajectory.title:
I didn’t only learn to tattoo.
I learned to move with art.

timeline.title: SWITZERLAND
timeline.text: Where I refined my technique and precision in black and grey realism.

timeline.title: INTERNATIONAL CRUISES
timeline.text: Taking my art to different countries taught me to adapt each piece to each story.

timeline.title: CONSTANT EVOLUTION
timeline.text: I keep studying, experimenting and growing as an artist.

locationsAvailability.label: LOCATION
locationsAvailability.title: Available internationally.
locationsAvailability.description: I currently work between Switzerland, Memphis21 (Gandia) and international cruise projects. My schedule is organized by season and location, so bookings are managed based on availability.

items.title: Concept
items.description: I listen to your idea and turn it into a clear, personal creative direction.

items.title: Design
items.description: Every piece is built from scratch, adapted to your anatomy and style.

items.title: Execution
items.description: Precise work in a professional environment—careful and controlled.

studio.label: THE STUDIO
studio.p1: I work in a professional, hygienic and controlled environment. Each session is carried out with calm, precision and respect for your skin.
studio.p2: I create a personalized experience where conversation and trust are part of the creative process.

portfolio.label: MY WORK
portfolio.title: Stories marked on skin.
portfolio.descriptionLine1: Each piece is born from a different story.
portfolio.descriptionLine2: Filter by style and explore my artistic universe.

artwork.label: ART
artwork.title: Beyond the skin.
artwork.description: Beyond tattooing, I develop my artistic work on canvas. Each piece keeps my visual essence, exploring realism, color and contemporary expression.

items.question: How do I book an appointment?
items.answer: Bookings are handled exclusively via WhatsApp. Message me with your idea, approximate size and the body area. I’ll reply with availability and an estimated quote.

items.question: Do you work all styles?
items.answer: My work focuses on black and grey realism, anime style and color pop art. If you have a different idea, message me on WhatsApp and I’ll tell you if it’s a fit.

items.question: How much does a tattoo cost?
items.answer: Pricing depends on size, complexity, placement and estimated time. Every piece is custom, so I always provide a quote beforehand.

items.question: Do you require a deposit to book?
items.answer: Yes. A deposit is required to confirm the appointment. It secures your date and is deducted from the final price.

items.question: Do you do cover-ups or touch-ups?
items.answer: Yes, I do cover-ups and touch-ups for my own work. Send a clear photo of the area so I can assess it properly.

items.question: Minimum age to get tattooed?
items.answer: The minimum age is 18. I don’t tattoo minors.

booking.label: BOOKING
booking.title: Let’s plan your next piece.
booking.p1: If you have an idea in mind or want to start from zero, message me directly and we’ll shape it together.
booking.whatsappOnly: Bookings are handled exclusively via WhatsApp.
booking.instagramNoteLine1: Instagram is only for viewing work.
booking.instagramNoteLine2: Bookings are handled only via WhatsApp.

processLegacy.title: A personal, exclusive and fully guided process.

steps.title: Concept
steps.description: A personal conversation to translate your idea, emotion and references into a clear visual direction.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: An exclusive sketch with a composition adapted to the body and a timeless aesthetic read.

steps.title: Execution
steps.description: A precise, controlled session focused on detail, rhythm and an elegant result.

contact.label: Booking
contact.title: If your next piece deserves real artistic direction, let’s begin.
contact.description: Open agenda for selected projects. Bookings available in Switzerland, Memphis21 (Gandia) and international cruises.
